From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Over a lush valley a thunderous noise stirs the natural habitat. Over a
large building of dust, a stampede of wild stallions can be seen,
running away from a group of hyenas, as a Hawk keep watch over top. A
hyena leaps, and grabs one of the horses.


The D.E.D ships DNA scanner juts out of the top of the ship. The blue
energy wave sweeps over the area, and covers the large group of animals.
"Protoform DNA, selected." the computer interupted over the ships audio
systems. Inside the CR chambers holding Nightmare and Jagged, the
brothers began to be repaired, and changed.
